constraints.name: modular_equation_solution
constraints.description: 求解模方程 a^x ≡ b (mod p) 的最小自然数解 x
constraints.formal: Find the smallest natural number x such that a^x ≡ b (mod p)

constraints.name: no_solution_case
constraints.description: 如果无解，输出特定字符串 'No Solution'
constraints.formal: If no solution exists, output 'No Solution'
